html:
Refused has launched the final edition of their 1994 debut album This Just Might Be… The Truth. The pressing features the artwork the band wanted in the first place, as well as their unreleased 1993 demo. Get it here.

"The demos we made prior to recording this is where it's at," said Refused of the definitive reissue. I"f the record had sounded like the demos, it would be held in higher regard, by us and everyone else. Guess what, this edition has the demos and also the cover we wanted before Freddan convinced us the cover painting needed a blurry live pic on top…"

Refused is currently out on their farewell tour across the world, with the North American dates having just wrapped up. Check out the remaining dates below and tickets are available here.
